answers.answer: I have to do one every week going fwd since I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes. I'm also 34wks. Not looking fwd to the excess doctors visits but whatever's best for baby... Y do u have to do it?
I have gestational diabetes too, but I don't have to take meds for it. I just have to watch my diet. I guess that explains why I am having to do it.
I do non stress tests twice a week because I have gestational diabetes. I'm 36 weeks now

question: Does everyone have to have a non stress test? I am 34 weeks now and I have to do one next week.
title: Non Stress Test
